title: Hand With Index Finger And Thumb Crossed Medium Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Fingers Crossed Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents good luck, hope, or a wish. Also used to indicate a promise or a commitment.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the hand with index finger and thumb crossed emoji is rendered with a medium-dark skin tone, showcasing Apple's commitment to diverse representation with smooth, realistic shading. The fingers are gracefully curved, and the subtle glossiness applied by Apple's design team gives the digit a natural, tactile feel. This emoji, with its soft rounded edges and gentle highlights, is often used on Apple devices to convey good luck, hope, or a wish for something to happen, adding a touch of optimism to digital conversations.
